net.sf.beezle.mork.compiler

Class MorkMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.beezle.mork.mapping.Mapper
      • net.sf.beezle.mork.compiler.MorkMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MorkMapper
extends Mapper
    Global state, instances represent globale options. The this class forms a Java API to Mork -- whereas the Main class forms a command-line interface. Use Mork
    See Also:
